https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gstseU9L8yKhKRlfHZbA2IHQxzI.jpg Sun Xiangcheng, a self-styled professional fan organiser, is called from his home village of West Well Valley by his mother Yuanfang. Thinking he's highly connected with celebrities, she asks him to help organise the village's New Year celebrations Better and Better
